item.title: Need help with action handler!
item.dc:creator: @Army123 Army123
item.description:
@Army123 wrote:

This is a Pi 317 rsps
Im making a dialogue that includes action…
i want to make dialogue to teleport player if their playertotal level is greater than 2000+

for example
if
(c.playertotal >= 2000) {
c.dialogueaction = (not yet decided);
c.teleaction = (not yet decided);
} else {
sendNpcChat1(“blah blah blah blah”, c.talkingNpc, “blah blah bal”);
c.nextchat = blah blah

if this the correct format? or diffrent way? the one im tripping over is the play total level… i can’t seem to find the correct format for that…
i tried c.totalevel, c.total… idk what to put…

Read full topic
